title: Serene Hoi An Riverside Retreat Near UNESCO Heritage-Listed Old Town
description: Between the gentle waters of the Thu Bon River and Old Town’s World Heritage-listed teahouses, terraces and temples rests Anantara Hoi An Resort, located just minutes from the town’s signature district. Sample Vietnam’s culinary delights by the waterfront at Hoi An Riverside, enjoy wood-fired pizza and original art at the art space or immerse yourself in local wellness traditions at Anantara Spa. When you’re ready to explore, Hoi An’s lantern-filled streets and world-class banh mi bites await.
offer_address: 1 Pham Hong Thai Street, Hoi An City, Quang Nam Province, Vietnam
